name: I'm Not a Toast!
description:
Made for FlamingHotJam!

You're playing as this one cute slice of bread, which is DEFINITELY not a toast!! Or at least it doesn't want to become a one.. SO YOU GOTTA HELP IT OUT!!

Spit on your enemies to kill them! ..Spit? Yeah, SPIT! But what's difficult about spitting, you may ask? YOU CAN SPIT ONLY WHEN YOU JUMP!! You might think that's also not too difficult? BUT WHEN YOU JUMP YOU LOSE YOUR ABILITY TO SEE!! But what does it have to do with br-- I DON'T CARE, HELP THIS LITTLE GUY NOT TO BECOME A TOAST!! 

Let's see what score can you get and how long can you survive!
